Company: Penn State Milton S. Hershey Medical Center
Description of incident: Penn State Milton S. Hershey Medical Center began alerting patients of a data breach when an employee accessed clinical data on an unauthorized computer and removable storage device. The employee did have permissions to have access to the files, but downloaded the clinical information on a removable storage device and his personal computer, both of which were not properly secured and outside of the medical centers IT department. The employee also used their personal email account to send emails with a test log of the data to two physicians at the medical center.
